headline: Exclusive  J.D. Vance: Joe Bidens Propaganda Ministry Is About Enforcing Speech Codes on Americans
author: John Binder
sentences:
I just hope Republicans grow a spine and actually fight back against whats going on.?
"Who Do I F*ck" to Be "Rich Famous and Powerful" Biden Truth Minister Sings pic.twitter.com/EAYT2o4nL1
 Breitbart News (@BreitbartNews) April 29, 2022
Vance, a staunch supporter of using antitrust laws to break up giant tech conglomerates, said all the issues that conservatives care about from election fraud to illegal immigration are reliant on an open internet that allows free speech.

Vance, whose candidacy in the Ohio Republican Senate primary race has been endorsed by former President Donald Trump, exclusively told SiriusXM Patriots Breitbart News Daily that Bidens Disinformation Governance Board is a blatant attempt to silence Americans on social media companies controlled by a handful of billion-dollar tech corporations.

LISTEN:
It is petrifying and I think we should take it seriously because whether its Biden or the people who pull the strings, this is definitely a very serious thing,? Vance said of the Department of Homeland Securitys (DHS) Disinformation Governance Board, announced by DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas this week.

You have this woman whos being put in charge of it who hasnt accomplished, as far as I can tell, really anything but she has all the fancy credentials, went to all the fancy schools, has this air of expertise even though she hasnt actually earned it by actual accomplishment,? Vance continued.

Vance said he found it hilarious that this comes out about the same time that Elon Musk announces that hes going to buy Twitter,? suggesting the Biden administration is worried about the Tesla founder returning the social media company to a free speech-oriented platform.

Biden's Disinfo Minister Sings About Solving "Mystery Between" Harry Potter's "Legs" pic.twitter.com/K998zQ51H9
 Breitbart News (@BreitbartNews) April 29, 2022
The other thing thats just so weird about this  these bureaucrats are all the same.

Vance, the best-selling author of Hillbilly Elegy, says President Joe Bidens propaganda ministry,? referencing the administrations new Disinformation Governance Board, is all about enforcing speech codes on American citizens.
All of this stuff is predicated on having an open public square  if you dont have an open public square, its just fundamentally rigged for the left, nothing can get accomplished,? Vance said.
Jankowicz has called herself the Mary Poppins of Disinformation? and claimed that any online mocking of Vice President Kamala Harris is a threat to national security, among other things.
Its just a clear effort to try to create a propaganda ministry that further enforces the speech codes that allow the left to dominate debate,? Vance said.
And its pretty clear that this is the sort of person, you dont want a Ministry of Truth at all, but you dont want a person like this running it,? he said.
This is why I always say the Big Tech issue may be the most important modern issue because it affects all the other ones,? he continued.
Vance also called out Nina Jankowicz, the Biden-appointed chief of his Disinformation Governance Board.
Vance, with Trumps backing, is currently leading his GOP primary opponents in the Ohio Senate race.
And I think were going to see some pretty crazy stuff come out of it.
Its all the same personality types,? Vance said.
John Binder is a reporter for Breitbart News.
Email him at jbinder@breitbart.com.
Follow him on Twitter here.
The election is on May 3.
J.D.
